mapper.sql: bill_id, uid, target_uid, room_uid, bill_status, obj_id, obj_type, gift_id, gift_num, diamond_num, gold_num, money, create_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from bill_record
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into bill_record (bill_id, uid, target_uid, room_uid, bill_status, obj_id, obj_type, gift_id, gift_num, diamond_num, gold_num, money, create_time, update_time) values (#{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{targetUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roomUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{giftId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{giftNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{diamondNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goldNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into bill_record
bill_id,
uid,
target_uid,
room_uid,
bill_status,
obj_id,
obj_type,
gift_id,
gift_num,
diamond_num,
gold_num,
money,
create_time,
update_time,
#{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{targetUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{roomUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{billStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{objType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{giftId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{giftNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{diamondNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

mapper.update:
update bill_record
uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
target_uid = #{targetUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
room_uid = #{roomUid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
bill_status = #{billStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
obj_id = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
obj_type = #{objType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
gift_id = #{giftId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gift_num = #{giftNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
diamond_num = #{diamondNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
gold_num = #{goldNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},
money = #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bill_record set uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, target_uid = #{targetUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, room_uid = #{roomUid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bill_status = #{billStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, obj_id = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, obj_type = #{objType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, gift_id = #{giftId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gift_num = #{giftNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, diamond_num = #{diamondNum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gold_num = #{goldNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, money = #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where bill_id = #{billId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: br.bill_id as bill_id, br.bill_status as bill_status,br.diamond_num as diamond_num, br.gold_num as gold_num, br.money as money, br.create_time as create_time, br.update_time as update_time, u.uid as uid ,u.erban_no as erban_no,u.nick as nick,u.phone as phone ,a.alipay_account as alipay_account,a.alipay_name as alipay_account_name,u.gender as gender, u.withdraw_status, br.gift_id, a.weixin_openid,br.apply_withdrawal_account,br.apply_withdrawal_name,br.real_transfer_account,br.real_transfer_name
mapper.select:
select
from bill_record br force index(key2) INNER JOIN users u ON br.uid=u.uid INNER JOIN account a ON u.uid = a.uid
ORDER BY br.create_time DESC

select bt.id,bt.uid,bt.tran_type as tranType,bt.real_tran_type as realTranType,bt.cost,bt.money,bt.bill_status as billStatus,bt.create_time as createTime,bt.update_time as updateTime,bt.bill_id as billId, us.erban_no as erbanNo,us.nick,us.gender,us.phone,a.weixin_openid as wxOpenId,a.alipay_account as alipayAccount,a.alipay_name as alipayAccountName,us.withdraw_status as withdrawStatus, ubc.bank_card as cardNumber, ubc.bank_card_name as cardName,ubc.open_bank_code as openBankCode, bt.apply_withdrawal_account as applyWithdrawalAccount,bt.apply_withdrawal_name as applyWithdrawalName,bt.real_transfer_account as realTransferAccount,bt.real_transfer_name as realTransferName from bill_transfer bt inner join users us on bt.uid = us.uid INNER JOIN account a ON us.uid = a.uid left join user_bank_card ubc on bt.uid = ubc.uid and ubc.is_use = 1 WHERE bt.bill_status not in (2,4) AND us.withdraw_status = 0 AND bt.bill_id IN
#{item}

select COUNT(DISTINCT bt.uid) as userNum ,us.gender as gender, sum(bt.money) as money from bill_transfer bt inner join users us on bt.uid = us.uid INNER JOIN account a ON us.uid = a.uid
GROUP BY us.gender

select bt.id,bt.uid,bt.tran_type as tranType,bt.real_tran_type as realTranType,bt.cost,bt.money,bt.bill_status as billStatus,bt.create_time as createTime,bt.update_time as updateTime,bt.bill_id as billId, us.erban_no as erbanNo,us.nick,us.gender,us.phone,a.weixin_openid as wxOpenId,a.alipay_account as alipayAccount,a.alipay_name as alipayAccountName,us.withdraw_status as withdrawStatus, bt.apply_withdrawal_account as applyWithdrawalAccount,bt.apply_withdrawal_name as applyWithdrawalName,bt.real_transfer_account as realTransferAccount,bt.real_transfer_name as realTransferName from bill_transfer bt inner join users us on bt.uid = us.uid INNER JOIN account a ON us.uid = a.uid WHERE bt.bill_status not in (2,4) AND us.withdraw_status = 0 AND bt.bill_id = #{billId}

select bt.id,bt.uid,bt.tran_type as tranType,bt.real_tran_type as realTranType,bt.cost,bt.money,bt.bill_status as billStatus,bt.create_time as createTime,bt.update_time as updateTime,bt.bill_id as billId, us.erban_no as erbanNo,us.nick,us.gender,us.phone,a.weixin_openid as wxOpenId,us.alipay_account as alipayAccount,us.alipay_account_name as alipayAccountName,us.withdraw_status as withdrawStatus, bt.bank_card as cardNumber,bt.bank_card_name as cardName,bt.open_bank_code as openBankCode,bt.admin_id as adminId,bt.pingxx_id as pingxxId, bt.apply_withdrawal_account as applyWithdrawalAccount,bt.apply_withdrawal_name as applyWithdrawalName,bt.real_transfer_account as realTransferAccount,bt.real_transfer_name as realTransferName from bill_transfer bt inner join users us on bt.uid = us.uid INNER JOIN account a ON us.uid = a.uid
order by bt.create_time desc
